io.micronaut.runtime.server

Interface EmbeddedServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApplicationContextLifeCyle<EmbeddedServer>, ApplicationContextProvider, AutoCloseable, Closeable, LifeCycle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyHttpServer

    public interface EmbeddedServer
extends ApplicationContextLifeCyle<EmbeddedServer>

    An EmbeddedServer is a general abstraction to manage the lifecycle of any server implementation within a running Micronaut application.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
